column4: I know this is not a webhosting channel, but I wanted to ask if there is a way to start a hosting company (billing system, control panel for client and for administrator) with open source software? I've read, I've googled..and I did find virtualmin but I don't know the diference between virtualmin and webmin...I want to be able to sell shared hosting and reseller accounts for my clients, and manage all this thru a billing system..is this pos
cool, I just hope I could find a fellow hoster around :D
Theres, #web, #ubuntu-offtopic, even #freenode might be able to suggest a better channel
